revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Slowpoke Well |image = [[File:Slowpoke Well.png]] |caption = A map of Slowpoke Well. |tokens = 3,500 |location = In Azalea Town. }} '''Slowpoke Well''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 67,900 |- | Slowbro (Boss) || 280,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Slowpoke * Slowbro (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 25% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 25% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
